argument.description: An expression that specifies the value to be assigned into a bucket.
An expression that specifies the value to be assigned into a bucket.
An expression that specifies the value to be assigned into a bucket.
An expression that specifies the value to be assigned into a bucket.

description: The WIDTH_BUCKET function is used to create equal-width histograms.
sample:
SELECT EMPNO, SALARY, WIDTH_BUCKET(SALARY, 35000, 100000, 13)
      FROM EMPLOYEE ORDER BY EMPNO
